org.netbeans.core

Class ProxySettings.Reloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.core.ProxySettings.Reloader
  • Enclosing class:
    ProxySettings

    public abstract static class ProxySettings.Reloader
extends Object
    A bridge between o.n.core and core.network. An implementation of this class brings a facility to reload Network Proxy Settings from underlying OS. The module core.network provides a implementation which may be accessible via Lookup.getDefault(). It's not guaranteed any implementation is found on all distribution.
    Since:
    3.40
